name: snelsingles

body.origin:
|- wcel(csn(c0), csingles)
-| wex(hs0, wceq(csn(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
-| wb(wcel(csn(c0), csingles), wex(hs0, wceq(csn(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ { c0 } ∈ Singletons
⊣ ∃(hs0, { c0 } = { hs0 })
⊣ ({ c0 } ∈ Singletons ↔ ∃(hs0, { c0 } = { hs0 }))
